channel.title: *NEW* NexusRSPS is BACK! *New*
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IUDC8Sp.png[/img]
I'm not NEW to mopar, I have been using Moparscape advertising since 2008, My old account is I ahrim I for proof, Thanks!
We're BACK! We had 1500+ Votes when we last hosted for almost 2 years! We have a ton of new features for HardCore RSPS Players, like PRESTIGE MODE! with Double EXP and Stat Restore bonuses! and a custom shop!
We are basically a NEW SERVER, ad's posted on Jan/13th/2016
Forums: [url=http://nexus.web-rpg.com/]Official NexusRSPS forums[/url] Download client: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/82431811/NexusRSPS%20Client.jar]click here to download NexusRSPS Client[/url] _____________________________________________________________________________________ [b]Staff[/b] Developer of Nexus: Doom
Currently hiring staff members! (do not ask for a staff spot, apply on forums) _____________________________________________________________________________________ [b]Features[/b]
- *NEW* Custom Barrows Minigame (NEVER BEFORE SEEN!) - *NEW* Custom FreeForAll (Fun PKZone) - *NEW* Pestcontrol with NPCS! - Daily/Weekly in-game updates - Member can be bought with in-game coins! - In-game member credits (100 credits = 10m gp); - 2 worlds Main World & PvP - Prestige System 1 - Prestige Master - Prestige Bonuses like restoring stats! and 2x EXP! - Loyality titles - Completionist cape with ::goals! - Tok-haar kal - Weekly events (double xp, Bonus pk points, drop partys, Holiday Events) - Perfect combat - Dragon pickaxe - Dragon armour trimmed sets - Crystal chest - Drop partyroom - Working torva & virtus with HP boost - Banking with item searcher, bank all and bank armour - All skills working 100% - Top 10 Pk leaderboards with kills and deaths
~Bosses~ - Godwars - King Black Dragon - Chaos Elemental - Tormented Demons - Metal dragons - Corporal beast - Nomad - Bork - Tok-haar Jad AND A LOT MORE!
~Media~
coming soon...

item.title: *NEW* NexusRSPS is BACK! *New*
item.dc:creator: @rspsNexus rspsNexus
item.description:
@rspsNexus wrote:

I’m not NEW to mopar, I have been using Moparscape advertising since 2008, My old account is I ahrim I for proof, Thanks!

We’re BACK! We had 1500+ Votes when we last hosted for almost 2 years!
We have a ton of new features for HardCore RSPS Players, like PRESTIGE MODE! with Double EXP and Stat Restore bonuses! and a custom shop!

We are basically a NEW SERVER, ad’s posted on Jan/13th/2016

Forums: Official NexusRSPS forums
Download client: click here to download NexusRSPS Client

Staff
Developer of Nexus: Doom

Currently hiring staff members!
(do not ask for a staff spot, apply on forums)

Features

  • NEW Custom Barrows Minigame (NEVER BEFORE SEEN!)
  • NEW Custom FreeForAll (Fun PKZone)
  • NEW Pestcontrol with NPCS!
  • Daily/Weekly in-game updates
  • Member can be bought with in-game coins!
  • In-game member credits (100 credits = 10m gp);
  • 2 worlds Main World & PvP
  • Prestige System 1 - Prestige Master
  • Prestige Bonuses like restoring stats! and 2x EXP!
  • Loyality titles
  • Completionist cape with ::goals!
  • Tok-haar kal
  • Weekly events (double xp, Bonus pk points, drop partys, Holiday Events)
  • Perfect combat
  • Dragon pickaxe
  • Dragon armour trimmed sets
  • Crystal chest
  • Drop partyroom
  • Working torva & virtus with HP boost
  • Banking with item searcher, bank all and bank armour
  • All skills working 100%
  • Top 10 Pk leaderboards with kills and deaths

~Bosses~

  • Godwars
  • King Black Dragon
  • Chaos Elemental
  • Tormented Demons
  • Metal dragons
  • Corporal beast
  • Nomad
  • Bork
  • Tok-haar Jad
    AND A LOT MORE!
